H1.text: who is the biggest selling female group of all time. TLC

H2.text: who is the biggest selling female group of all time. The Supremes

H3.text: who is the biggest selling female group of all time. Spice Girls

A4.text: Destiny's Child have sold more than 60 million records worldwide, making them one of the best-selling girl groups of all time.

A5.text: Billboard ranked Destiny's Child as the third most successful girl group in chart history, behind TLC and the Supremes.

A6.text: The Supremes were the most commercially successful of Motown's acts and the most successful American vocal group, with twelve number 1 singles on the Billboard Hot 100.
